text: Stagecoach Group plc ()Companies House extract company no SC100764 Stagecoach Group plc is a leading international transport group operating buses, trains, trams, express coaches and ferries. The group was founded in March 9, 1980 by the current chairman, Brian Souter; his sister, Ann Gloag; and her former husband, Robin. The group is based in Perth, Scotland, and has operations in the United Kingdom and in North America. == References == == Other websites == * Stagecoach Group official site Category:Public transport in the United Kingdom Category:Perth, Scotland
title: Stagecoach Group
